original_text: And in it have I put the ark, wherein is the covenant of the Lord, that he made with the children of Israel.
korean_text: 내가 또 그 곳에 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손과 더불어 세우신 언약을 넣은 궤를 두었노라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And in it have I put the ark
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 안에 내가 궤를 두었으니

sentences.original_text: wherein is the covenant of the Lord
that he made with the children of Israel
